data.text:
Independence High School

Independence High School is located in Bakersfield, California and serves 9th Grade through 12th Grade students. Independence High School is a member of the Kern High School District school district in Kern County. Using the Main Menu you will find lots of information and statistics on Independence High School to assist you in deciding about your child’s education.

Main Menu

School Name: Independence High School School District: Kern High School District County: Kern County State: California Grades: 9th Grade through 12th Grade NCESID: 61954012132.0

Write A Review

Attention students, parents, teachers, administrators, employees and alumni.. Please write a review of your experiences and your time at the school, so other people can know what a great place it is! Also, if you have a favorite teacher or someone else at the school that is special to you, be sure to mention them.

Please rate Independence High School on a 1 to 5 star scale, 5 stars being the best, for the following categories:

Teachers and academics.

Princial and administrators.

Classrooms and facilities.

Sports and extracurricular activities.

Parent and community involvement.

Return To Main Menu

Source: For more information about where the information presented here was sourced, visit our Data Source page.

Stockdale High School

Stockdale High School is in Bakersfield, California and is made of 9th Grade through 12th Grade students. Stockdale High School is part of the Kern High School District district in Kern County. Using the links below you will find lots of valuable information on Stockdale High School to assist you with making a decision about your child’s education.
